Error.title: Oops! Something went wrong
Error.description: We apologize for the inconvenience. Our team has been notified and is working on a solution.
Error.instruction: If the problem persists, please contact our support team at <email></email>

hero.title: Master Your Finances with Easy & Accessible App
hero.subtitle: A dynamic lending platform designed to simplify and make accessible lending solutions. Our platform not only empowers users with flexible financial solutions but also fosters a community-driven approach to finance.

features.title: Discover the Power of New P2P Platform
features.subtitle: Find out our awesome features below

content1.title: Involve yourself through its P2P platform
content1.description: You can participate in a financial ecosystem as both borrowers and lenders. This inclusion can be a stepping stone to greater financial literacy and independence.

content2.title: Explore an alternative service to conventional banking
content2.description: We provide a more accessible financial service to wider audience, including those traditionally underserved by banks

content3.title: Enjoy a more competitive and fair interest rates
content3.description: Enjoy a more competitive and fair interest rates through our P2P platform, giving borrowers a more affordable alternative to informal lenders.

faqs.title: FAQs
faqs.subtitle: Have a question? Check out our FAQs

contact.title: Stay ahead of the curve with the latest updates
contact.subtitle: Unlock awesome opportunities by participating in a whole new financial platform
